alert.note: Alert for Burleigh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 5:35AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, light snow. Additional snow accumulations up to half of an inch. * WHERE...Burleigh County. * WHEN...Until Noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel due to snow and blowing snow reducing visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills will cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate winter clothing.
